name: MK Ultra
wikiSummary: MK Ultra is the 7th track on Muse's 5th studio album The Resistance. The title of the song is derived from Project MK-ULTRA, the code name for a CIA project that sought to use drugs for the purposes of mind control and interrogation. The song is described as being "electric sounding" and having "spidery riffs".
wikiText:
MK Ultra is the 7th track on Muse's 5th studio album The Resistance. The title of the song is derived from Project MK-ULTRA, the code name for a CIA project that sought to use drugs for the purposes of mind control and interrogation. The song is described as being "electric sounding" and having "spidery riffs".
